title: it s a bug or someone s cheating ?
body: just had a game but 10mins in the game  my mouse start to move really slow and my left click and right wont do anything . i can hear a sound from my headphone.  also i cant send anything to my team.  i dont know it s a bug or someone s cheating. u can check the match history it s on the 4 th  the game i played quinn

replies.body:
Any graphical bugs or anything of the sort? A faulty power supply can cause all sorts of weird problems with peripherals and can also make the game freeze (it tends to happen in game because the draw is highest during these times). Do you hear any ticking or any strange sounds from your power supply? And are there any other issues you've been seeing in game? These kinds of errors aren't really something that could be affected by someone externally.

What do you mean exactly when you say you couldn't send anything to team? Any other details you can give?
